lead_paragraph: SPIRO--Emil, passed away peacefully, surrounded by family on January 14, 2016 at his home in Santa Fe, New Mexico at the age of 88. Born in Germany, he escaped the Holocaust alone as a boy of 11, spending the years of World War II as a refugee in Switzerland. He came to New York City in 1947 as the sole survivor of his family, and established a successful career in the insurance industry. He is survived by his wife Jaffa, daughter Saguna (Robert), sons Lenny and David and granddaughter Dhyana. Donations in his memory can be made to the United Jewish Appeal or City Harvest. 1/3
